column4: I was able to install Ubuntu to an external firewire hdd, but I was not able to boot off of this hdd.  Is this a known issue, or did I set up the partitions or something, or?
I was under the impresesion that you can't run an operating system off an external HD. But..I don't know very much. Perhaps thats just with windows.
OS X allows you to boot off the firewire hdd
you just have to hold down 'f' or something
